message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this incredible product to you. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on this amazing product, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase such a unique item. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a new offer of $900000. This is a fair price considering the product's unique features and value. I'm confident you'll find it's a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's unique features, I would like to counter with an offer of $875000.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not quite there, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'm proposing a new offer of $890000. This is my final compromise, and I'm confident it's a fair price for the product. I'm eager to hear your thoughts.
I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with an offer of $885000.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you at $880000, but no lower. This is my final and best offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. After evaluating the situation, I would like to counter with an offer of $877500.

Bob, I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you at $880000, but no lower. I'm not willing to compromise further. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with an offer of $878750.
